name: Trapped (itch) (Cnmhqwerty)
description:
Small puzzle game prototype where the goal is to unlock the door within 30 seconds, you will need to replay the game over to figure out the combinations of items then see how fast you can escape (fastest I got in testing was 21 seconds remaining)

Controls: 

  • Left click to select item 1 
  • Right click to select item 2 
  • Space bar to combine items 
  • Audio cues will indicate if a combination is a success or not so sound should be on 

 

 

Resources I used for this prototype:

  • https://opengameart.org/content/medieval-peasants 
  • https://opengameart.org/content/gold-treasure-icons 
  • https://opengameart.org/content/gold-treasure-icons 
  • https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-flames 
  • https://opengameart.org/content/bombs 
  • https://opengameart.org/content/alchemy-or-witchs-cauldrons 
  • https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-pickaxe 
  • https://opengameart.org/content/elemental-stonesshrines-pixel-art 
  • https://opengameart.org/content/key-icons 
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/free-pixel-font-thaleah-140059 
  • TOP DOWN MOVEMENT in Unity!
